div.bibl: Abendpost, Nov. 27, 1929. CONTRIBUTIONS TO THE ECKENER COLLECTION

body.p: The following additional donations have been received by the Abendpost: Liedertafel Vorwaerts, $10.50; Adolph Eiwendt, $2.
The treasurer received the following sums: Karl Schranz, $1.... Total: $46.60. Last announcement : $15,013.53. Total sum: $15,060.13.
[Translator's note: As the closing of the collection had been announced previously, this represents the final sum.]
